name: Bark ByProduct
description:
Making shaped wood or insulated wood at a carpentry station produces bark as a byproduct.

Now admin configurable via mod control panel by hades.

Source at:  https://github.com/Kharzette/ConanMods
changeNote:
Changed this to not modify the recipe table at all.  It now attaches a component to carpentry benches that listens on the item crafted event.  If it is shaped wood or insulated wood, it adds bark.

Added a UI for admins to adjust the amount of bark to spit out.  Should work with the mod control panel by hades, but need to test it a bit
author: Kharzette
